attributes.action: Donate all frozen Russian assets to Ukraine immediately
attributes.additional_details: In light of Trumps shameful abandonment of Ukraine in its war for survival we must immediately donate all frozen Russian assets to the beleaguered country.  This is morally right and legal and represents a fraction of the compensation owed.
attributes.background: Compensate Ukraine with all frozen Russian assets immediately.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/712988
